RelatedSentence: Did you know that 85 to 90 percent of war 's casualties are non-combatant civilians ?
That is the conclusion reached by a nine - person research team in the June 2014 issue of the American Journal of Public Health .
The deaths of soldiers who are fighting the war are a small part of the human and economic cost .
Clearly , wars do not protect the lives of civilians .
On July 4th all across America there will be patriotic speeches about our soldiers who gave their lives for their country .
I am hard pressed to think of any examples of our soldiers giving their lives for our country .

Germany was defeated by the Soviet Union .

The executive branch , with the help of the Republican Federalist Society , has established that the office of the executive is a tyranny unaccountable to law , domestic or international , as long as the executive declares a state of war , even a war that is not conducted against another country or countries but a vague , undefined or ill - defined war against a vague stateless enemy such as al Qaeda , with which the US is currently allied against Syria .
